about.title: About Me
about.description: Passionate about scalable microservices, AWS solutions, and RFID/data-pipeline technologies. I specialize in building robust backend systems and modern web applications that can handle high-scale operations.
about.passion: My passion lies in creating efficient, maintainable code and implementing best practices in software development.
about.focus: I focus on delivering high-quality solutions that meet business requirements while ensuring excellent performance and scalability.
